a1: Twitter Cards are meta tags that allow you to attach rich media experiences to tweets that link to your content, showing titles, descriptions, and images.
a2: Twitter supports Summary (small thumbnail), Summary Large Image (full-width image), App (app install), and Player (video/audio) card types.
q3: Do Twitter Cards work on X?
a3: Yes, Twitter Cards continue to work on X (formerly Twitter). The meta tag format remains the same.
